amendatorysection.chaptername: State University, State Colleges, And Postsecondary Education
amendatorysection.catchline: Agent's permit; commissioner; grant or deny.
amendatorysection.para: Following review of an application for an agent's permit and any further information submitted by the applicant or required by the department and following such investigation of the applicant as the department may deem necessary or appropriate, the commissioner shall either grant or deny an agent's permit to the applicant.
